casebody.data:
Angela PICARD
v.
The GUILFORD HOUSE, LLC, et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided January 18, 2018

Norman A. Pattis, in support of the petition.

David J. Robertson and Christopher H. Blau, in opposition.

The petition by the plaintiff in error Linda Lehmann for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 178 Conn. App. 134, 174 A.3d 219 (2017), is denied.
